mapper.insert:
select KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO.nextval from dual
insert into KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION(KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, MEMBER_NO, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_WRITE_DATE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_ENABLED) values (#{knowledgeQuestionNo}, #{memberNo},#{knowledgeQuestionTitle},#{knowledgeQuestionContent}, 0,#{knowledgeQuestionWriteDate},#{knowledgeQuestionPoint}, 1)
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, M.MEMBER_Nickname, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_WRITE_DATE from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION join MEMBER M on KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_ENABLED =1 order by KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO desc ) a where rownum<=#{endRowNum} ) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.update: update KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION set KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT= KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT+1 where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO =#{knowledgeQuestionNo}
